content:
拟写一份《自我介绍》，巧解姓名，关联个人特征、性格、爱好等，
内容须新意，便于对方记忆，并适用于任何场景（职场、求职、社交等）。

Write a Self-introduction, skillfully understand the name, related to personal characteristics, personality, hobbies, etc.
The content should be original, easy to remember, and applicable to any situation (workplace, job hunting, networking, etc.).
